title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in TH, nothing happens. There is no indication or feedback of the action being performed.
EB: From the context menu, when selecting 'Add Javadoc', it should add the Javadoc for the selected field.
SR:
1. Open the TH file.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
4. Verify that the Javadoc is added for the field.
